The researcher knew that he was exalted when he said about the infidels.God of something and his saying: their guilt in it is saying: one of them: that the sin is here in the sense of gathering; Because it has the meaning of the verb, as it is said: the giving of people came out, that is, their giving, this is the saying of the deceased.The second: It is permissible for him to be intended to be a wonderful additive, as his saying: If you prepare the grace of God (Abraham: 34).* * Then he said: He was crushed to the companions of the pricing.And discord, as you say in the neck and the sneezing, Al -Zajaj said: A crushing is erected on the source, and the meaning is attached to God, and that is, that is, the one of them, that is, the one who is good Abu Ali al -Farisi: The measure was lesbian, and the source came to the deletion as their saying: the age of God.
